attributes.action: take Immediate action to help Hindus in Kazakhstan...
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are UK Citizens, as well as Hindus, who have sat and watched this situation of Hindus in Kazakhstan worsen over the last few years!  We demand that the prime minister of our country hears our words and takes action immediately on the situation which has seen laws of Human, as well as Religious, Rights taken away from fellow Hindus in Kazakhstan.

We are not happy with the responses we have received and demand an answer as to what the Government is going to do, as the last time this issue was raised by a senior member of our Government was in 2006 (Tony Blair).
